doc:
Alfredo Arias (theatre producer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfredo_Arias_(theatre_producer) 0 Alfredo Arias (born 4 March 1944) is a theatre producer, actor and playwright. Born in a Buenos Aires suburb, he has subsequently acquired French nationality and, since 1969 or 1970, been based in Paris. Alfredo_Arias ( born 4_March_1944 ) is a_theatre_producer , actor_and_playwright . Born in a_Buenos_Aires_suburb , he has_subsequently_acquired French_nationality and , since 1969_or_1970 , been_based in Paris .
